action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy of Utah introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the disclosure of certain records relating to substance use disorder medications to State prescription drug monitoring programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safe Prescribing Through Reporting Act of 2025.

section.header: Disclosure of certain records relating to substance use disorder medications to State prescription drug monitoring programs
section.text: Section 543(b)(2) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 290dd–2(b)(2)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: To the applicable prescription drug monitoring program of a State if—

clause.text: such record relates to the prescribing or dispensing of a substance use disorder medication; and
such disclosure is required by applicable State law.
